folder: Flushing Bay[Ditmars Boulevard - Between 24th Avenue and Northern Boulevard.], Queens, NY
text:
Flushing Bay (Queens): Three views across the bay in a northerly direction towards Rikers Island in the East River, The white sand below the embankment is new fill upon which was constructed Grand Central Parkway. The vantage points are different points on Ditmars Boulevard between 24th Avenue and Northern Boulevard.

P. L. Sperr

Views 1,2: October 24, 1935
View 3: October 21, 1936
title: Flushing Bay - Queens - [Ditmars Boulevard - Between 24th Avenue and Northern Boulevard.]
